Technical Translation Services for National Capital Region and Northern Canada
==========================

### Tender Announcement

#### Request for Proposals (RFP)

The Government of Canada invites interested consulting firms to submit proposals for the provision of technical translation services in the National Capital Region and Northern Canada (excluding Nunavut).

#### Background

The Department of National Defence (DND) requires technical translation services for specific documents in the National Capital Region and Northern Canada. The successful contractor will be responsible for providing linguistic translation services for these documents to support DND's requirements.

#### Services

The contractor will be required to provide technical translation services for a variety of documents, including:

* Technical reports
* Specifications
* Manuals

#### Requirements

The contractor must have the necessary expertise and resources to provide these services, which include:

* Translation of documents from English to French (and vice versa)
* Review and editing of translated documents
* Proofreading of translated documents

#### Standing Offer (SO)

The Government of Canada intends to establish a Standing Offer (SO) with a selected contractor for a period of one (1) year, with an estimated maximum value of $275,000. Call-ups under the SO will be valued between $1,000 and $40,000.

#### Evaluation Criteria

The proposals will be evaluated based on the following criteria:

* Quality of service (30%)
* Pricing and cost structure (25%)
* Experience and qualifications (20%)
* Company information and registration (10%)
* Other (15%)

#### Submission Requirements

Eligible bidders must submit their proposals through the MERX Electronic Bidding System on or before the closing date and time.

### Key Dates

* Closing date and time: Not applicable (the tender has expired)
* Tenders received after the closing date will not be considered.

### Contact Information

For more information on this RFP, please contact:

Mark Smith
Defence Construction Canada
mark.smith@dcc-cdc.gc.ca
613-859-0549
Note: This information is only accessible in English.

### Language Support

This notice is also available in French. For your convenience, the French language version is attached. However, the English language version will be the only authoritative source for this notice. Note: The information is not available in all languages supported by the bidder.
